phrases.pinyin: wǒ lái shǔ yī shǔ

phrases.chinese: 小草小小的，大树大大的

phrases.chinese: 大山小小的，天空大大的

phrases.english: The mountain is small, the sky is big

phrases.english: Took a big bite

phrases.chinese: 天空小小的，太阳大大的
phrases.pinyin: tiānkōng xiǎo xiǎo de, tàiyáng dà dà de

phrases.english: There is a moon in the sky

phrases.english: I love to ask mom questions

phrases.english: One what one? One person one

phrases.english: Two what two? Two little rabbits two

phrases.english: A week has seven days

phrases.english: I see nine little birds in the sky

phrases.english: Four what four? Four flying birds four

phrases.pinyin: wǔ shénme wǔ? wǔ xiǎo huā wǔ. wǔ àixīn wǔ
phrases.english: Five what five? Five small flowers five. Five hearts five

phrases.pinyin: wǒ ài māma. māma ài wǒ
phrases.english: I love mom. Mom loves me

phrases.english: I have ten fingers

phrases.pinyin: shān shàng yǒu yì zhī dà shānyáng
phrases.english: There is a big goat on the mountain

phrases.pinyin: sān zhī xiǎo yáng shàng shān
phrases.english: Three little sheep go up the mountain

phrases.english: There is a big water buffalo on the mountain

phrases.pinyin: yī zuò dà huǒshān
phrases.english: A big volcano

phrases.pinyin: wǒ ài xiào, wǒ ài tiào
phrases.english: I love to laugh, I love to jump

phrases.pinyin: wǒ shàng qù le, wǒ xià lái le
phrases.english: I went up, I came down

phrases.pinyin: wǒ shì xiǎo mǎ, pǎo pǎo pǎo
phrases.english: I am a little horse, run run run

phrases.pinyin: wǒ de kuàilè shǎo bù liǎo
phrases.english: My happiness cannot be without it

phrases.pinyin: wǒ yǒu xiǎo shǒu, māma yǒu dà shǒu
phrases.english: I have small hands, Mom has big hands

phrases.english: I want to drink water

phrases.pinyin: shān shàng yǒu hěn duō dà shí tou
phrases.english: There are many big rocks on the mountain

phrases.pinyin: méiyǒu rén zài mén kǒu
phrases.english: There is no one at the door

phrases.pinyin: wǒ shì niú, wǒ shì niǎo
phrases.english: I am a cow, I am a bird

phrases.pinyin: wǒ shì shān, wǒ shì yáng
phrases.english: I am a mountain, I am a sheep

phrases.pinyin: wǒ shì tàiyáng, yuèliàng, dà shù, cǎo
phrases.english: I am the sun, the moon, a big tree, and grass

phrases.pinyin: wǒ shì xīngxing, xiào xiào xiào
phrases.english: I am a star, laugh laugh laugh

phrases.pinyin: wǒ báitiān shàngxué
phrases.english: I go to school during the day

phrases.pinyin: tiān shàng yǒu hěn duō bái yún
phrases.english: There are many white clouds in the sky

phrases.pinyin: yòu yí gè rén lái le
phrases.english: Another person came

phrases.pinyin: xiǎo mǎ zài shān shàng chī cǎo
phrases.english: The little horse is eating grass on the mountain

phrases.chinese: 太阳爱白云，白云高兴地跑，跑，跑。
phrases.pinyin: tàiyáng ài báiyún, báiyún gāoxìng de pǎo, pǎo, pǎo
phrases.english: The sun loves white clouds; the clouds happily run, run, run

phrases.chinese: 月亮爱星星，星星快乐地跳，跳，跳。
phrases.pinyin: yuèliàng ài xīngxing, xīngxing kuàilè de tiào, tiào, tiào
phrases.english: The moon loves the stars; the stars joyfully jump, jump, jump

phrases.chinese: 天空爱小鸟，小鸟飞，飞，飞。
phrases.pinyin: tiānkōng ài xiǎo niǎo, xiǎo niǎo fēi, fēi, fēi
phrases.english: The sky loves little birds; the little birds fly, fly, fly

phrases.chinese: 大地爱小草，小草笑，笑，笑。
phrases.pinyin: dàdì ài xiǎo cǎo, xiǎo cǎo xiào, xiào, xiào
phrases.english: The earth loves little grass; the little grass laughs, laughs, laughs

phrases.pinyin: wǒ bú huì kāichē
phrases.english: I cannot drive

phrases.pinyin: shān shàng yǒu yí piàn dà nóngtián
phrases.english: There is a large farm field on the mountain

phrases.pinyin: nǐ yǒu jǐ gè hǎo péngyǒu
phrases.english: How many good friends do you have?

phrases.pinyin: wǒ shàngqù le
phrases.english: I went up

phrases.chinese: 棕色的熊，棕色的熊，你在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: zōngsè de xióng, zōngsè de xióng, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Brown bear, brown bear, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一只红色的鸟在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yì zhī hóngsè de niǎo zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a red bird looking at me

phrases.chinese: 红色的鸟，红色的鸟，你在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: hóngsè de niǎo, hóngsè de niǎo, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Red bird, red bird, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一只黄色的鸭子在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yì zhī huángsè de yāzi zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a yellow duck looking at me

phrases.chinese: 黄色的鸭子，黄色的鸭子，你在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: huángsè de yāzi, huángsè de yāzi, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Yellow duck, yellow duck, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一匹蓝色的马在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yì pǐ lánsè de mǎ zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a blue horse looking at me

phrases.chinese: 蓝色的马，蓝色的马，你在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: lánsè de mǎ, lánsè de mǎ, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Blue horse, blue horse, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一只绿色的青蛙在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yì zhī lǜsè de qīngwā zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a green frog looking at me

phrases.chinese: 绿色的青蛙，绿色的青蛙，你在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: lǜsè de qīngwā, lǜsè de qīngwā, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Green frog, green frog, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一只紫色的猫在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yì zhī zǐsè de māo zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a purple cat looking at me

phrases.chinese: 紫色的猫，紫色的猫，你在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: zǐsè de māo, zǐsè de māo, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Purple cat, purple cat, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一只白色的狗在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yì zhī báisè de gǒu zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a white dog looking at me

phrases.pinyin: yī jiā rén zài kàn jiémù
phrases.english: The family is watching a show.

phrases.pinyin: shān shàng méi yǒu rén
phrases.english: There is no one on the mountain.

phrases.pinyin: wǒ kànjiàn yī zhī niǎo zài fēi
phrases.english: I saw a bird flying.

phrases.pinyin: wǒ qù kāi mén
phrases.english: I’ll go open the door.

phrases.chinese: 白色的狗，白色的狗，你在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: báisè de gǒu, báisè de gǒu, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: White dog, white dog, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一只黑色的羊在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yì zhī hēisè de yáng zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a black sheep looking at me.

phrases.chinese: 黑色的羊，黑色的羊，你在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: hēisè de yáng, hēisè de yáng, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Black sheep, black sheep, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一只金色的鱼在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yì zhī jīnsè de yú zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a gold fish looking at me.

phrases.chinese: 金色的鱼，金色的鱼，你在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: jīnsè de yú, jīnsè de yú, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Gold fish, gold fish, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一个老师在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yí gè lǎoshī zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a teacher looking at me.

phrases.pinyin: lǎoshī, lǎoshī, nǐ zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Teacher, teacher, what are you looking at?

phrases.chinese: 我看到一群孩子在看我。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ kàndào yì qún háizi zài kàn wǒ
phrases.english: I see a group of children looking at me.

phrases.chinese: 孩子们，孩子们，你们在看什么？
phrases.pinyin: háizimen, háizimen, nǐmen zài kàn shénme
phrases.english: Children, children, what are you looking at?

phrases.pinyin: wǒmen yòu jiànmiàn le
phrases.english: We met again.

phrases.pinyin: tā shì yī gè nǚ háizi
phrases.english: She is a girl.

phrases.pinyin: tā shì yī gè nán háizi
phrases.english: He is a boy.

phrases.pinyin: māma huílai le
phrases.english: Mom came back.

phrases.pinyin: yī zhī xiǎo niǎo fēi chūlái le
phrases.english: A little bird flew out.

phrases.pinyin: xiǎo gǒu chūlái le
phrases.english: The puppy came out.

phrases.pinyin: xiǎo tù tiào shàng tiào xià
phrases.english: The little rabbit jumps up and down.

phrases.pinyin: xiǎo niǎo gāo gāo fēi
phrases.english: The little bird flies high.

phrases.pinyin: dà mǎ kuài kuài pǎo
phrases.english: The big horse runs fast.

phrases.pinyin: húdié shàng fēi fēi, xià fēi fēi
phrases.english: The butterfly flies up and down.

phrases.chinese: 我不是毛毛虫了，我好快乐。
phrases.pinyin: wǒ bú shì máomaochóng le, wǒ hǎo kuàilè
phrases.english: I’m not a caterpillar anymore; I’m so happy.
